Name: Orchard Crush
Ingredients: 60 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Review: Apple brandy and damson jam combine brilliantly in this tangy but not at all sweet cocktail.
History: Created in 2008 by Jeffrey Morgenthaler at Bel Ami Restaurant & Lounge in Eugene, Oregon, USA.
